text: Awful app keeps crashing and they give you nothing free like they promised got 25 free spins the app kept glitching and and crashing i won 30p that's the freebee the virtual horses are awful also keeps crashing strangely when your horse is say 2nd or 3rd then it crashes and you loss no I'm deleting this today lost 50 quid and feel I've been taken on to be honest.
replyText: Hi, if you are still experiencing problems please contact Customer Care who will be happy to assist you with your query. Contact us here: https://boylesports.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

text: Appalling. The slowest dysfunctional sports betting app out there. The responsiveness is disgraceful, takes forever to load pages and often misdirects you to wrong screen. Recent updates this week have made it worse. A simple top up is also an arduous task. Boyle sports management should be ashamed of themselves for launching this. I am closing my Boyle sports account as a result.
replyText: Hi Gary, if you are still experiencing problems please contact Customer Care who will be happy to assist you with your query. Contact us here: https://boylesports.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

text: Don't know if its a new update or whatever, but pages are agonisingly slow to load and it constantly logs me out and lands me back on the homepage. Used to be good, now pretty pointless and you're better looking elsewhere.

text: I have been using the BoyleSports app since the lockdown and I find it so handy to do all my bets for lotto, Daily Millions and euromillions. I would be lost without it

With the latest update you have achieved the seemingly impossible and made this app even glitchier than it was. Is there a link to download an earlier version? I have no programming experience, I've never slummed in silicon valley, I struggle to open Word on my laptop, yet I'm pretty sure I could develop a better app than this. Every update makes it worse. Consider beta testing. Shocking service. Do not download.

text: Helpful app to get different sports and easy to use
Great app. Lots of great games.

Got told in store to download app, easy to join, in fairness the guy said everything.. Except the most important stuff!! I downloaded and deposited ‚Ç¨20 and placed a bet on football, I got told I needed to scan a passport/drivers license, I did, then asked for utility bill, to which I explained I don't have one. Using "live chat" they explained can't do anything unless provide utility bill. I asked for my money to be returned to my bank account, NO, account suspended!! CRIMINAL ACT

Easy to use. Do my lotto most days and the odd horse or football bet. Really like when I withdraw my winnings as the money is in your account within a few hours. Had a small few issues but was easily and quickly resolved using the chat for help.

Perfect for what I would use it for which is predominantly horse racing. My only minor negative is when scrolling back up the page to the top it's super sensitive and refreshes all the time which can be an inconvenience if you are rushing to put a bet on.
I've been a customer with years, no app is perfect but Boylesports have done well in that it's easy to navigate, safe & secure. Highly recommended.
Very good app. Quick and easy to use. Also get bigger prices in multiples which is very attractive.

Good would be better if I could win my luck is shockingat the minute. Would also like to see cash out on horse racing and if you offer cash out on football we should not end up with suspended games as what is the point in having cash out if you can't do what it says on the tin lol. Keep up the good work.
Slow to load at first but after that basically the same as being online. Generally better odds across Gaa and football versus other bookmakers.
Great app, easy to navigate and always up to date with plenty of choice. Good specials and enhancements daily too
Great app easy to use and follow
Slow to respond at times, soccer accums are hard to find certain ones, apart from that it's better than some sports apps
I absolutely love the BoyleSports app, it's fantastic and easy to use. Tried other ones and hated them. Highly recommend the BoyleSports app. Great fun
Great app. Comes in so handy when can't get to the betting shop. Good customer service and no complaints so farüëç
App is so easy to navigate, although 4 stars as it can be quite slow during big events!
Excellent App very straightforward to use. User friendly and good offers to. Great for Horse Racing, Football and all sports.

App works well but I would like to see win alerts introduced to help punters keep track of bets and also a search tab for winning bets rather than settled bets but it's generally good and the facility to watch raced you have a bet on is excellent, almost always reliable
Very good Great selection of markets
App has got a bit better since the last update but still logs me out when I have clicked the stay logged in button but it's very easy to find what you are looking for
Good and easy to use

Great bookmakers with fantastic loyalty system. Love betting on this app.
